product_name: Hennessy Hammock Snakeskins XL Stuff Sacks - 2 Pack
long_description: This pair of Hennessy Hammock Snakeskins XL Stuff Sacks pack away your hammock in about 30 seconds and help prevent it from getting dirty or muddy by keeping it from touching the ground. Hammock (sold separately) packs easily into the 2 tapering silnylon stuff sacks on the ropes at each end for quick set up and take down. Hennessy Hammock Snakeskins XL Stuff Sacks hold your entire hammock, netting and rainfly.
short_description: This pair of Hennessy Hammock Snakeskins XL Stuff Sacks pack away your hammock in about 30 seconds and help prevent it from getting dirty or muddy by keeping it from touching the ground.
